comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Just like the lab rat that keeps depressing the reward lever well after the food pellets have run out, I've - like Dennis - hit "refresh" on this site more times than I can count, thinking one day I might actually see some movement. I think they call that "superstition." But now, by Jove, loyalty, faith, and, above all, abject boredom, have paid off. Here before our very eyes; the rebirth of America's finest news source. Welcome home, Mr B! DU
